meanings.definition: A person holding religious beliefs other than those of the main world religions.
meanings.sent1: Some pagans celebrate nature and the changing seasons.
meanings.sent2: The pagans in the village gathered to honor their ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The pagans decided to have a picnic in the forest to connect with their spirituality.
meanings.sent4: In the land of pagans, the stars were believed to be the eyes of their gods.
meanings.sent5: The colorful rituals of the pagans left a lasting impression on the travelers.

meanings.definition: A follower of a polytheistic religion.
meanings.sent1: Ancient pagans worshipped multiple gods and goddesses.
meanings.sent2: The pagans built temples to honor their deities.
meanings.sent3: The pagans threw a feast to celebrate the harvest season.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of pagans, each deity had a specific role in their lives.
meanings.sent5: The music of the pagans' ceremonies echoed through the valley.
